cluster_relations.rel_desc: Religious texts are placed in the burial chamber as part of the funerary assemblage.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that an item is deliberately deposited or placed inside a specific spatial container or structure (e.g., an object placed in a tomb or burial chamber as part of a ritual or assemblage).
